Text: I hope if possible out of respect for those involved and the potential for off color flames in the comments that TPB can remove my last Torrent Post from the PORN section....Sometimes I really do screw up...its just that it took me about 5 attempts to get it too load at all...and when it did...its just a few clicks from other...

And please above all else understand how this tears me apart inside to post these things. It exhaust me and scars in the voice of my mother in my frame of a small seven year old boy a few days before my brother ripped my mouth open for tellin. My mother screamed when I told her what I'd seen my father doing, when I told her everything, can you imgagine seeing your fathe of all things...your father...and mother screaming into the very depths of your terror....that it was me...that she would protect me if I didn't tell from being put away where  people would hurt...she'd protect...that it was me...that was so sick to make this up....Please understand in pushing so very hard to expose those things is that endless terror that rips me apart inisde that still keeps me from touching my guitar.
I feel so wrong in posting here...I simply have no alternative at all, at all.

Thank you TPB. If you are awar of how I have used your Torrent in these last few weeks in this way. Thank you so much. am forever forever in your debt.
These things are unfortunately extremely true. Here I have some hope that this may stay...forever...as it should.
And in that is a fear to keep from  trusting in anything, just in case I get hurt again.
Than so very much.

I simply do not know enough about uploading a torrent. I have to almost identical versions of these...the other is in the PORN catagory by mistake.
I have no idea which of the two torrents I have in utorrent are working correctly now after screwing around to try and fix it....this one unfortunately shows no seeders and downloaders while the other immediately shows 14 downloaders and a number of seeders. I do not want to disrupts either of these posts. The contents are the description if all you want to do is cut and post.
I am showing much more downloades today and I hope if possible for those who will taht they will hold and seed this for me to insure that it stays around. And I will post a note in here daily to let you know if I do too, which I sincerely hope I do...I have alot to imporve on the piano..and still to pick up the guitar agin...I am very close with Eddie when I play especially on the guitar and just know until this is resolved hopefully it has just been to difficult to play. Someday I hope to post somthing on guitar that sounds nice.

I now see in uTorrent without knowing exaclt what I am seeing 21 Dowloaders on or the other of these two post. It is seeding as it has extremely extremely slow for such a very small torrent.
I simply am having hundreds IPs acccessing my computer through my router every few seconds. 
And yet only a handeful of Downloaders. PLease if you will please remain trying to dl these and be patient I have so far seeded what is reported as 1.68 mb which is not bad considering that this is only a 66 kb torrent. If possible DL these for me and keep them here. Please. And thank you.

I stated much earlier that I was considering posting the organization IPs flooding my router. I have decided not to. For one it would take weeks to sort out and I would not risk posting a downloader Ip. That simple. I have destroyed the txt files containing the IPs and clear my router log regularly.

I hove apparently seeded now on the other torrent now about 5 mb whcih I would assume at close 50 kb file is about 100 copies which seems high but currentl uTorrent shows 14 Downloaders. 
I thought a text post in that Category wouldn't exactly get noticed.
Maybe the old line about buying Playboys just to read the articles is true.
Anyway I am glad this is getting some attention now.
If no one continues to do anything at least this is now out there.
I will however today post a torrent including all the media organizations and government organization I have contacted in this that have not returned any response and hopefully someday if someone who has little more pull than me, which apparently is just about anyone, hopefully they can research if these organizations ever forwarded my reports on as required by the law. Thank you.

Usually in my wintersbutterfly blogspot I have about 6 viewers a day. I have already had over 30 to day. I been struggling with this for a few weeks now hoping to get this out and somehow it seems to be now. Thank you.

I was recently blocked from accessing TPB for around ten minutes. DownOrNot showed access to TPB. I opened my TOR Browser and had instant access. I posted my concerns on TheTwitsEnd at twitter and I got access again.

There is a man in Tulsa who around 15 years ago killed his two teenage girls in their sleep and also his wife with a hatchet. I was told by someone at the time that worked in cases concerning Child Sexual abuse that the father killed the girls to cover up his abuse of them.
These kids were my brothers neighbors when he lived in town. The girls were my nephews close friends.
I no longer feel comfortable in anyway in holding anything at all back that is even remotely coincidental.
I so not have the resources to know if this is irrelevant. I have reported this in my last email with the OK SLO for DHS, who refuses to respond.
Just to even respond.

It is just of random interest.
It contains references mention about OBrian....
The only thing in her otherwise is Chris Russos comment ot me after Eddie died that his family was in the New Orleans Mafia. They moved right after Eddie died. I have Chris' pictures through out my year books. He is real. And he didn't say hey I think I'm related to the guy in Jim Garrisons prosecution in New Orleans of Clay Shaw.
He said the New Orleans Mafia. I thought he was full crap at the time. I had never heard of it myself til many years later.
And Compare the name in my dad's work journal among other entries I posted that listed a Tom Rasso or Russo as a contact back in 64...
